SENT.plain: A young female patient was admitted for clarification of a space-occupying ovarian situation
Histological analysis gave the finding of a highly malignant NHL of the Burkitt type
In the further course of the disease bicytopenia developed
Bone mark analysis revealed a B-AII
FAB L3 which can be considered as the leukemic equivalent of the Burkitt lymphoma
In spite of chemotherapy the patient died as a consequence of a sepsis
